thread.title: Gib/Jib and chuck time out code

post.author: ZippyDSMlee
post.body:
where is it we must add time to it...lots of time >>

also I am having some problems adjusting the deathpush code on the shotgun anyone understand it well enough to help me adjust it to something I like,altho the 10 foot tossing is kinda neat

BTW any easy way to change the nailgun to a penetrating weapon,the duke devastator clone it has become is cute but..I dunno its not a "nail gun"....
